samālapati：[saṃ-ā-lap] 言說，語言，回復言語的能力．
samālapati：[saṃ-ā-lap] 話しかける，語る，言語能力を回復す．
Samālapati，[saṁ+ālapati] to speak to，address J．I，478．At J．I，51 it seems to mean “to recover the power of speech．” （Page 686）
